page.title: 19A BANK HOLIDAY WEEKEND
page.content: Yesterday I went to my Granma's and grandad's.On Sunday I played at doing "Sign Post To English",Then I helped my mum and dad with the gardening.Then I went to Sunday School where we did a collarge of things that were going to be alive.I also went to Bircots for a swimming lesson.I'm getting better at breast-stroke but my best stroke is front crawl.On Bank Hoilday Monday I watched the Wide Awake Club which had a film on all about war.Then I watched a video about Superted and Spotty at the Funfair.It was brilliant.
